name: drop
tagline: A self-hosted file sharing service with drag-and-drop uploads
description: Drop is a minimalist, self-hosted file sharing service that allows drag-and-drop uploads and generates shareable links. It focuses on simplicity and speed, making it a handy replacement for generic file-drop services.

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Share files by dragging them into the browser window for instant upload without forms

features.title: Shareable Links
features.description: Generate unique URLs for each uploaded file that can be shared with others for download

features.title: File Preview
features.description: View images and text files directly in the browser before downloading to verify content

features.title: Upload Limits
features.description: Configure maximum file sizes and storage quotas to control resource usage on your server

features.title: Clean Interface
features.description: Focus on file sharing with a minimal design that loads quickly and works on all

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep uploaded files on your own infrastructure without relying on third-party services
